topic.title: PRIMARY DIAGNOSIS (ICD AT START SYSTEMIC ANTI-CANCER THERAPY)
topic.shortdesc: PRIMARY DIAGNOSIS (ICD AT START SYSTEMIC ANTI-CANCER THERAPY) is the PRIMARY DIAGNOSIS (ICD) at the start of the Systemic Anti-Cancer Therapy.
